WRITING.TITLE: [TOMT]movie
WRITING.TEXT:
hey i'm looking for a movie I saw bits of, its a crappy early 2000s film. the film has the main character (scientist) talking about his life and the events in the movie in a white room cause its the after life cause he dead (some god stuff ). He is kinda confused in those scenes, doesnt remember much. any way he finds this guy who lived in the wild and or just outside the city. He takes him and puts him in a cage at work. the scientist guy is involved with his french? assistant. But she eventually falls for the wild man. Meanwhile the scientist is teaching the wild guy proper social behavior etc. and it has flashbacks showing how the guy became wild and how the other became an asshole.
anyway the girl shoots the scientist and helps the wild man return to the wild, drops him off naked (weird right?) and she drives off. but a car soon arrives and we learn the wild man prefers society and I think the girl joins nature or something. :/ anyway thanks for any help you guys!

hey thanks for reading it and getting back! You mentioned in the other post "The writing is a bit random, and could probably use some additional planning." too which i did, so much it changed the whole tone. whoops. And I would say there was humor but different compared to the first half, a lot of it is reference's and inside jokes. I'm not trying to make excuses, but from the rescue till end I can see what you mean. I will try to keep a consistent tone in further projects.

WRITING.TITLE: Just finished my comic and would like some critiques!
WRITING.TEXT:
Hello again, last time I posted here was over a year ago and it helped me alot. I took the advice and went away with it ( thanks /u/deviantbono ) But to here and now. The comic is 55 pages long, so sorry in advance! I know it's not great, especially the art but I would mostly like to get help on the writing,jokes and the overall story but anything that would help is appreciated. Thanks!
Comic located here: http://thomassayle.weebly.com/
last post here : https://www.reddit.com/r/comic_crits/comments/3dowh8/tom_and_liam_o_a_comic_i_started_to_makexpost/
